scripts.build:wasm: node -e "require('fs').mkdirSync('wasm', { recursive: true })" && emcc cpp/effects.cpp -o wasm/effects.js -O3 -s WASM=1 -s MODULARIZE=1 -s EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS=['cwrap'] -s EXPORTED_FUNCTIONS=['_grayscale','_malloc','_free','_sobelEdgeDetection','_hueRotate','_spiralDistortion','_brightnessContrast','_gammaCorrection']
